definition: heart (as the seat of emotions)/cardiac atrium
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Typically, intracardiac catheters are positioned in the right atrium and in the coronary sinus.
sentences.chinese: 通常上是把心脏内导管置于右心房和冠状静脉窦内。

sentences.english: Variation of afterload influenced not only early, but also late diastolic filling parameters.
sentences.chinese: 后负荷变化影响舒张早期及心房收缩期左室充盈。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a method for primary culture and subculture of human atrial myocardial cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索人心房肌细胞的原代及传代培养方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of pulmonary vein isolation on atrial depolarization.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨成功的肺静脉电隔离对心房除极的影响。

sentences.english: One day, forgiveness will tiptoe in and take up gentle occupancy in your heart.
sentences.chinese: 总有一天，宽容会悄悄地来，温柔地入住你的心房。

sentences.english: This is a heartwarming moral tale.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个暖人心房的道德故事。

sentences.english: I will fill my heart with the silence and endure it.
sentences.chinese: 我将用你的沉默填满心房，并忍受它。

sentences.english: Warfarin is the better choice in the anticoagulative treatment of atrial fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 而华法令是目前心房颤动抗凝较好的选择。

sentences.english: The left atrium receives oxygenated blood from lungs.
sentences.chinese: 左心房接受从肺部来的带氧血液。

sentences.english: Early in the morning, the flavor of the sun ran into the nasal cavity, graceful posture in atrium.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，阳光的味道扑进鼻腔，曼妙的姿态映入心房。

sentences.english: Objective To ascertain the relevance of KCNE1 gene and lone atrial fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨KCNE1基因与孤立性心房颤动的关系。

sentences.english: The combined contraction of the atria and ventricles is a heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 这种心房和心室收缩的结合称为一次心跳。

sentences.english: The attack of AF has its fundamental cause and trigger.
sentences.chinese: 心房颤动的发生常有其基础病因和促发因素。

sentences.english: DV Doppler waveform of this dextrocardia fetus showed a nearly ab- sent atrial systole wave.
sentences.chinese: 右位心胎儿DV多普勒血流波形的心房收缩波近缺失。

sentences.english: Atrial fibrillation is much more common than atrial flutter.
sentences.chinese: 心房纤颤比心房扑动更为常见。

sentences.english: Atrial fibrillation is much more common than atrial flutter.
sentences.chinese: 心房纤颤比心房扑动更为常见。

definition: bottom tip of the heart/fig. innermost feelings/coll. my darling
in the depth of one's soul
pit of the stomach/solar plexus/words and thoughts
(usually of sth intangible) to seep into/to permeate
to think of/to long for/to miss
